title: Tesla Inc. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       slid 3.10% to $193.76 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       falling 0.92% to 15,630.78 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.17% to 38,563.80. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Tesla Inc. closed $105.53 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (103.8 M) remained 6.4 million below its 50-day average volume of 110.2 M.
